meanings.definition: The action or process of finalizing something.
meanings.sent1: The finalizations of the project took longer than expected.
meanings.sent2: After many finalizations, the document was ready to be submitted.
meanings.sent3: The finalizations of the party decorations made everyone excited for the event.
meanings.sent4: Her finalizations of the puzzle pieces brought the whole picture together.
meanings.sent5: The finalizations of the recipe included adding a pinch of salt for flavor.

meanings.definition: The state of being finalized or completed.
meanings.sent1: The finalizations of the construction project were celebrated by the team.
meanings.sent2: The finalizations of the paperwork signaled the end of a long process.
meanings.sent3: The finalizations of the game level unlocked a hidden surprise for the player.
meanings.sent4: The finalizations of the novel left readers satisfied with the ending.
meanings.sent5: The finalizations of the painting brought out its true beauty.
